Kit Kats smell seemed to be getting closer. Silver Scout knew that for some
reason Kit Kat had stopped. caution told her to stay back in concealment but
curiosity got the best of her. Even though the hall was well lit the wolf
continued forward. The mutant wolf used her masking ability to bend the
light around her. This wouldn't protect her from the other wolf but it would
make her invisable to the optics of any other bot who happened by.

----------------------------

BlackFortress' allarm started to ring, an stranger had come in
BlackFortress (Silverscout).

Silver Scout jumped, startled by the sudden noise. She moved closer to the
wall as a precaution that bots may be patrolling the halls. Having someone
trip on her was the last thing the mutant wanted.

----------------------------------------------------
::KitKat2::

She heard the alarms.
"Yes, back up on the way!" She opens the door and heads to where the bot
would be.

 Kit Kats scent was once again moving. this time though it was getting
stronger. The other wolf was circling until reinforcements arrived. Silver
Scout crouched low ready to pounce if the need arose.

Doors began to close around her. It was obvious that she was being herded
towardthe reinforcements. She was close enough to the others to hear voices.
"So they think I'm that easy to catch do they?" She thought snickering at
thier overconfidence, "We'll just have to see about that." The wolf creapt
closer remaining silent. The only one Silver Scout had to worry about was
Kit Kat so the mutant decided that she'd be the first target. After that the
others would be easy pickings.
----- Original Message -----
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 16, 2001 5:26 AM
Subject: Re: KitKat2


> ::KitKat2::
>
> Now in the base she picked up a scent that was out of place.
> "KitKat, terorrize."
> She transformed to bot mode, and pulled a plasma rifle.
> She waited for the bot to come near her room.
